post.title: What "Being Basic" Really Means
post.content:
Being basic generally has a negative connotation to it. However, it shouldn't be viewed in such a negative light. Whether you have your daily cup of Starbucks in hand,  a warm and stylish scarf around your neck, or thick-brimmed glasses on, being basic is a lifestyle.
